name: Snack
description: Throw me a Bone already! Or any kind of crunchy treat.

name: Stuffy
description: It gets lonely in the kennel, I would love a soft friend to snuggle with.

name: Dinner
description: Dinner for days that is! This will cover a bag of nutritious food.

name: Bed
description: A comfy hammock bed to keep me warm and dry,

name: Health
description: Whether it's shots, a wellness exam, or a snip, your donation will go a long way to keep me healthy.

name: Adoption
description: I'd love to come home with you! Just need to make sure your home is suitable to my needs.
